import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {DataContext} from '../Context' import '../css/Products.css' import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel' import '../css/Car' export class Products extends Component { static contextType = DataContext; render() { const {products} = this.context; return (

First slide label

Second slide label

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

Third slide label

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur.

 { products.map(product =>(

{product.title}

{product.description}

${product.price}
)) }
) } } export default Products
